scripts.publish:win: cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p always --win --config
scripts.publish:mac: cross-env npm run build:mac-arm && cross-env npm run build:mac-x86
scripts.publish:mac-arm: cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p always --mac --config --arm64 -p always
scripts.publish:mac-x86: cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p always --mac --config --x64 -p always
scripts.publish:linux-x64: cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder --linux --config --x64 -p always
scripts.build:all: cross-env npm run build:mac && cross-env npm run build:win && cross-env npm run build:linux
scripts.build:win: cross-env node php.js --win && cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p never --win --config
scripts.build:mac: cross-env npm run build:mac-arm && cross-env npm run build:mac-x86
scripts.build:mac-arm: cross-env node php.js --arm64 && cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p never --mac --config --arm64
scripts.build:mac-x86: cross-env node php.js --x64 && cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p never --mac --config --x64
scripts.build:linux-x64: cross-env node php.js --linux && cross-env npm run build && cross-env electron-builder -p never --linux --config --x64
